name: Grow Tiky Grow!
description:
In this 5 level mini clicker game, rescue Tiky  -  a  mysterious fur ball who's only hope for survival and growth is you.

You found a mysterious starving fur ball in the forest and named him Tiky.

You promised to take care and help him grow strong and healthy with lots of love, care and of course FOOD.

However after some time Tiky suffers a mutation. He becomes able to digest inorganic things and happily enjoys his new crunchy edible treats. 

When his endless hunger starts to get a little out of hand, it's up to you to decide on how to proceed and maybe control his never ending growth.

Features:

Fast and easy - For those looking for a fast game 

Slow, simple and rewarding - Slower but sweet, very sweet.

Slow, tricky, Hard and frustating - It will be rewarding too but will take much more planning then the other 2 endings.

How can someone resist such a cute fur ball!

As any other clicker game, you better expect some clicking if you want the best endings!

But don't worry, this version is easier and quicker to complete then the original prototype. Also, the easier route takes about 5 minutes to finish so no need to feel overwhelmed.

CONTROLS:
  • Left mouse Button to select, confirm and build towers
  • Right mouse Button to cancel any actions
ASSETS: All assets and sound effects were made by Kenney and can be found at his website:
www.kenney.nl
All assets used are free and under the CC0 license.  8-bit music by annoyedcactus at Freesound.org

(I couldn't mix kenneys jingles in a music)

SoumiAriel (aka Millama-Chan)
